entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 5:24 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:24 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late in the evening then 40 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:24 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
